text: Where all men think alike, no one thinks very much.
author: Walter Lippmann

text: All men's gains are the fruit of venturing.
author: Herodotus

text: All men have an instinct for conflict: at least, all healthy men.
author: Hilaire Belloc

text: We should weep for men at their birth, not at their death.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

text: I have 20,000 girlfriends, all around the world.
author: Justin Timberlake
